title: 求看报错，Operand stack overflow
author: zinsser901224
txt_content:
最新更新了一下cofh，结果更新了一大堆东西 然后报了这个错。反复试了好多mod的增减都不行。必须大量减少mod才可以解决。这个是什么问题？烦请大神解答


---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  DLFMLCorePlugin (动态光源DynamicLights-1.12.1.jar)
  JechCore (拼音搜索.jar)
  BetterFoliageLoader (更好树叶BetterFoliage-MC1.12-2.1.10.jar)
  Techguns Core (techguns-1.12.2-2.0.1.1.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) (foamfix-0.10.2-1.12.2.jar)
  OpenModsCorePlugin (OpenModsLib-1.12.2-0.12.1.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (物品整理.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Ooh. Shiny.

Time: 10/7/18 5:16 PM
Description: Unexpected error

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
建议用2759forge，由于有很多mod作者将近一年或者半年没更新
而forge一直在更新或者修复bug，这样那些一年半年没更新的mod就不兼容新的forge

replies.author: RSN_GK
replies.txt_content: 模组无问题，看看是不是FORGE的问题吧
